item.title: Aron van de Pol
item.description: Aron van de Pol is a PhD candidate at the Centre for Digital Humanities (LUCDH) and the Institute for Area Studies (LIAS). Personal Page

item.title: Jelena Prokic
item.description: Jelena Prokic is an Assistant Professor at the Leiden University Centre for Digital Humanities. Her research focus is on the use of computational methods in the study of language, with emphasis on quantitative approaches to language variation and change. Personal Page

item.title: Jiahui Liang
item.description: Jiahui Liang is a PhD candidate at Leiden University Centre for Linguistics (LUCL) and Leiden University Centre for Digital Humanities (LUCDH). Personal Page

item.title: Jiehai Liu
item.description: Jiehai Liu is a Guest Researcher at the Leiden University Centre for Linguistics. Personal Page

item.title: Matthew Sung
item.description: Matthew Sung is a PhD candidate at Leiden University Centre for Linguistics (LUCL) and Leiden University Centre for Digital Humanities (LUCDH). Personal Page

item.title: Ruben Ros
item.description: Ruben Ros is a researcher at the Leiden Center for Digital Humanities and the Department for History.
